response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to both of us. Given its worth to you, I propose a price of $950,000 for the product. This offer reflects my commitment to ensuring that you receive an exceptional value while maximizing the return on this valuable asset. I believe this price strikes a fair balance between the intrinsic value of the product and your expectations. Should you have any concerns or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive consideration of this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
